name: Manga Oku no Hosomichi
storyline:
The game begins in a small 6 tatami wooden apartment. You have no work every day and spend your days going back and forth between your futon and desk, but try to do part-time jobs and training. Your knowledge points will increase and your drawing ability will improve.

You can always draw your manuscript. When it is finished, ask the publisher to take a look at it. It may be rejected at first, but you may come up with a good idea while taking a walk to avoid distraction.

If your manuscript is accepted and your reading cartoon gains popularity, you can get a serialization. However, serialization is grueling for a weekly manga artist who spits blood.

If you do your job admirably despite being pressed by deadlines, you may become a popular manga that is even made into an animated cartoon or movie. Once the comics are released, you can hire assistants and concentrate on the manga you want to draw.
